metadata.title: Aleutian Islands Groundfish Survey Database

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC)

metadata.description: Bottom trawl position and catch data from the Aleutian Islands includes planned survey trawls completed by NOAA vessels, chartered commercial fishing vessels, and foreign fishing and research vessels. Standardized surveys were completed in 1980, 1983, 1986, 1991, 1994, and 1997. Data includes biological data such as length, weight, age, and species composition.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To provide resource assessment estimates to management.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: As Needed
